about_the_game:
21 tracks in to high quality format wav 16 bit, which you can enjoy in the game Infinitum, from artists such as Alin and Betelgeuze. Beautiful music in a style chill out, breaks, deep house.
The composition of DLC tracks include:
Alin - Afrodita
Alin - Cradle
Alin - Eos
Alin - Geba
Alin - I Hear You
Alin - Terminus
Alin - Third Name
Betelgeuze - Chrome (Slow Mix)
Betelgeuze - Depth System
Betelgeuze - Desert Thoughts
Betelgeuze - Found The World
Betelgeuze - Hellas
Betelgeuze - Measurement
Betelgeuze - Might
Betelgeuze - Mystery Theme
Betelgeuze - Revival
Betelgeuze - Spirit Of Music
Betelgeuze - The Water Under The Sky
Betelgeuze - Universe
Betelgeuze - Unusual
Betelgeuze - World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Sound Card: The sound device compatible with DirectX® 9
